title: Ex-Coach store manager sues, says weight led to firing
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
Coach is being sued by a former Detroit-area store manager who says weight gain led to her dismissal after more than 10 years at the high-en... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
